88a3b9be-1750-4b03-8781-875d3fbd7240.description: Earners of the Intro to Online Learning digital badge have completed the "Introduction to Online Learning" course on the Education Fund's Canvas Learning Management System. These individuals have demonstrated an understanding of how to navigate the unique challenges of learning in a virtual environment, how to use the necessary technology, and how to develop effective study habits and manage their time.
88a3b9be-1750-4b03-8781-875d3fbd7240.name: Intro to Online Learning

badge_template_activities.title: Completed 2.5 hours of online, self-paced content on Canvas

d9253902-cefe-4f33-a684-f8b0c938f3cc.description: Earners of the "Telehealth Basics" digital badge have completed the training successfully as part of the Education Fund's Telehealth Online Series in partnership with Portland Community College. These individuals have developed practical tools in the administration of telehealth. They understand the AIDET Tool for telehealth, know how to maintain a professional appearance, have cultural sensitivity, and know how to avoid compassion fatigue.
d9253902-cefe-4f33-a684-f8b0c938f3cc.name: Intro to Telehealth Basics

badge_template_activities.title: Telehealth is commonly defined as the use of information and telecommunications technology in health care delivery for a specific patient involving a provider across distance and time. The use of various remote technologies increase patient access to care when and where they need it. Telehealth has the potential to decrease health expenditures and improve patient experience.  Telehealth Basics provides an introduction to telehealth, and provides learners with tools to improve healthcare.

ea5671e0-6e3b-44fc-84eb-07aabc9a48ae.description: Earners of the Emotional Intelligence digital badge have completed the "Developing Emotional Intelligence During Difficult Times" training as part of the Education Fund's Self-Development Webinar Series. These individuals have demonstrated an understanding of various personality types and the ability to navigate difficult or emotionally charged reactions in a way that promotes clear communication and a thoughtful resolution.
ea5671e0-6e3b-44fc-84eb-07aabc9a48ae.name: Developing Emotional Intelligence During Difficult Times (Webinar)

badge_template_activities.title: Completed 1.5 hours of webinar content led by Emotional Intelligence Consultant, DB Bedford

a71585bb-c8a9-4ff1-8186-43134f51727f.description: Earners of the Pandemic Readiness digital badge have completed the "Pandemic Readiness Course" on the Education Fund's Canvas Learning Management System. These individuals have demonstrated an understanding of screening and testing, infection control techniques and precautions, ventilator management, stress management and resilience, and immunity and vaccines.
a71585bb-c8a9-4ff1-8186-43134f51727f.name: Pandemic Readiness

c94ce260-463b-454a-a425-aa472aad5739.description: Earners of the Patient Experience digital badge have completed the "What Do Patients Want? The Key to Enhancing the Patient Experience" training as part of the Education Fund's Self-Development Webinar Series. ba2a96e7-bf4b-4fac-87ec-f84f27e5cfc2.description: Earners of the Emotional Intelligence digital badge have completed the "Developing Emotional Intelligence During Difficult Times" training as part of the Education Fund's Critical Skills Webinar Series. ba2a96e7-bf4b-4fac-87ec-f84f27e5cfc2.name: 2022 Developing Emotional Intelligence During Difficult Times (Webinar)

4449c3dc-0bc0-4e37-b944-402221e8400f.description: Earners of the Cultural Sensitivity digital badge have completed the "Cultural Sensitivity: Increasing Patient Engagement Through a Cultural Lens" training as part of the Education Fund's Critical Skills Webinar Series. These individuals have demonstrated an understanding of culture and how it affects communication styles. They have learned to listen to understand, practice empathy, and check for attunement when engaging with colleagues, patients, and others from different cultural backgrounds.
4449c3dc-0bc0-4e37-b944-402221e8400f.name: 2021 Cultural Sensitivity: Increasing Patient Engagement Through a Cultural Lens (Webinar)

badge_template_activities.title: Completed 1 hour of webinar content led by Learnit instructor, James Jeffley

cfc3f53f-48d1-4555-8358-6582e8f76060.description: Earners of the Challenging Patients digital badge have completed the "Working with Challenging Patients: Coping with the Impact of COVID-19" training as part of the Education Fund's Self-Development Webinar Series. These individuals have demonstrated an understanding of tactics to successfully deal with escalated patients, particularly those impacted by COVID-19. They are able to better understand their patients from an empathetic, trauma-informed perspective.
cfc3f53f-48d1-4555-8358-6582e8f76060.name: Working with Challenging Patients: Coping with the Impact of COVID-19 (Webinar)

badge_template_activities.title: Completed 1.5 hours of webinar content led by Kevin Conboy, MSW, Staff Development Director at Seneca Family of Agencies

2f2d17cf-bd56-43f5-a8b0-341066f9c9fa.description: Earners of the Resiliency digital badge have completed the "Resiliency in Changing Times" training as part of the Education Fund's Wellness Webinar Series. These individuals have developed practical tools to approach change management in a constantly shifting work environment driven by new technology. They understand the process of transition and how to overcome personal fears or anxiety to embrace change with a solution-focused attitude.
2f2d17cf-bd56-43f5-a8b0-341066f9c9fa.name: Resiliency in Changing Times (Webinar)

badge_template_activities.title: Completed 1 hour of webinar content led by Learnit instructor.

5e1c5504-3c2c-41f5-b5af-32a166d5af8b.description: Earners of the Challenging Patients digital badge have completed the "Working with Challenging Patients: Coping with the Impact of COVID-19" training as part of the Education Fund's Critical Skills Webinar Series. These individuals understand tactics to successfully de-escalate situations with emotional patients, particularly those impacted by COVID-19. They have also learned about what happens in the brain under stress and fear, as well as how to handle tough conversations with patients.
5e1c5504-3c2c-41f5-b5af-32a166d5af8b.name: 2022 Working with Challenging Patients: Coping with the Impact of COVID-19 (Webinar)

badge_template_activities.title: Completed 1 hour of webinar content led by Learnit instructor, Bindi Delaney.

5c0f8e0b-8d89-4a6e-8717-600ae1da2853.description: Earners of the Resiliency digital badge have completed the "Resiliency in Changing Times" training as part of the Education Fund's Critical Skills Webinar Series in partnership with Learnit. These individuals have developed practical tools to remain adaptable and open-minded in a constantly shifting work environment. They understand how to maintain a growth mindset, manage stress when facing new challenges, and embrace the opportunity to develop new skills and ideas.
5c0f8e0b-8d89-4a6e-8717-600ae1da2853.name: 2021 Resiliency in Changing Times (Webinar)

badge_template_activities.title: Completed 1 hour of webinar content led by Learnit instructor, James Jeffley.

ebcd50c8-6f57-4e5c-b067-d80f83938c40.description: Earners of the Self-care digital badge have completed the "Self-care for Healthcare Workers" training as part of the Education Fund's Critical Skills Webinar Series, in partnership with Learnit. These individuals have demonstrated an understanding of the importance of mindfulness, building healthy habits, and exercising physical and emotional self-care in order to cultivate a more positive attitude towards themselves and those around them.
ebcd50c8-6f57-4e5c-b067-d80f83938c40.name: 2021 Self-care for Healthcare Workers (Webinar)

badge_template_activities.title: Completed 1 hour of webinar content led by James Jeffley.

d88bf6b4-3c28-48ec-95cd-006ff7561962.description: Earners of the Self-care digital badge have completed the "Self-care for Healthcare Workers" training as part of the Education Fund's Self-Development Webinar Series. These individuals have demonstrated an understanding of the importance of mindfulness, building healthy habits, and exercising physical and emotional self-care in order to cultivate a more positive attitude towards themselves and those around them.
d88bf6b4-3c28-48ec-95cd-006ff7561962.name: Self-care for Healthcare Workers (Webinar)

ebc89657-2d92-40cb-b255-233dbf7ffb8a.description: Who knew that burnout is an official medical phenomenon, recognized by the World Health Organization? It’s easy to see why – the long hours, “always-on” work challenges, and the constantly changing environments. In this training, participants will learn the causes of burnout, how it physically affects the brain, and how to recognize (and react) to the symptoms.
ebc89657-2d92-40cb-b255-233dbf7ffb8a.name: Avoid Burnout

badge_template_activities.title: Completed 1 hour of webinar content led by a Learnit instructor, earners of the Avoid Burnout digital badge have completed the "Avoid Burnout" training as part of the Education Fund's Wellness Webinar Series. Participants have learned the causes of burnout, how it physically affects the brain, and how to recognize (and react) to the symptoms.

e8654aa3-654b-4aa0-bfa4-361f759622b6.description: Earners of the Growth Mindset digital badge have completed the "Growth Mindset" training as part of the Education Fund's Wellness Webinar Series. These individuals have demonstrated an understanding of the mental framework and tools needed to prepare for change and to maintain a growth mindset amidst uncertain times.
e8654aa3-654b-4aa0-bfa4-361f759622b6.name: Growth Mindset

badge_template_activities.title: People who have a growth mindset approach challenges better and can persevere with difficult tasks and decisions. As healthcare professionals and educators, we should strive for a growth mindset to help ourselves, but to also help our patients embody a mental perspective that will help them face seemingly negative situations. This training will give participants the mental framework and tools needed to prepare for change and to maintain a growth mindset amidst uncertain times.

1765cba9-75c7-4d35-8d1b-2789e1c70b99.description: Earners of the Cultural Sensitivity digital badge have completed the "Cultural Sensitivity: Increasing Patient Engagement Through a Cultural Lens" training as part of the Education Fund's Self-Development Webinar Series. These individuals have demonstrated an understanding of implicit bias, where it comes from, and how it shows up. They have increased their awareness of their own identities in order to improve their ability to thoughtfully engage with their patients.
1765cba9-75c7-4d35-8d1b-2789e1c70b99.name: Cultural Sensitivity: Increasing Patient Engagement Through a Cultural Lens (Webinar)

badge_template_activities.title: Completed 1.5 hours of webinar content led by Kijafa Idalliah, MPA, Workforce Development & Staff Equity Trainer at Seneca Family of Agencies

f9ed6ba8-a7d2-432c-ba1c-cef22797dc0c.description: Learn to effectively communicate information and ideas in a professional setting, with or without preparation. Not every opportunity to speak is a presentation. What about meetings, water cooler conversations, interviews? There are a host of situations where your ability to verbally present information or ideas in a clear, compelling and concise manner will be called upon. This class is designed to help you handle those situations professionally and skillfully.
f9ed6ba8-a7d2-432c-ba1c-cef22797dc0c.name: Speak to Be Heard

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the Speak to Be Heard Webinar: Part I and Part II
